# MPMediaEntityPropertyPersistentID

**Global Variable**

The persistent identifier for a media entity.

## Declaration

```swift
let MPMediaEntityPropertyPersistentID: String
```

## Discussion

This value contains a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/kernel/uint64_t] (unsigned long long) which you can use to build a media property predicate, as described in [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMediaPropertyPredicate].
title: MPMediaEntityPropertyPersistentID
